content.question:
Figure 1 shows three labeled organelles (I, II, III) in a eukaryotic cell.

Figure 1. A eukaryotic cell

Which of the following is a claim that could be made about the relationship between organelles I, II, and III in Figure 1?

choices.label: All three organelles play a direct role in the production, modification, and transport of proteins that are released from the cell.
All three organelles play a direct role in the breakdown of materials that enter the cell.
Organelles I and II synthesize macromolecules that are then transported by organelle III to the electron transport chain to become part of cellular respiration.
Organelles II and III synthesize and transport proteins that are then digested into amino acids by organelle I.

content.answer: All three organelles play a direct role in the production, modification, and transport of proteins that are released from the cell.
